page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our area is mainly country-side.Running through some beautiful scenery is the River Tees which has a public footpath along the north side.There are a few{mills}along side the{river}and some are in ruins. We have part of the A66 which is the course of a Roman Road.There is a caravan site opposite Barnard Castle on the south side of the river. A place worth a visit is{Egglestone {Abbey.}There are exactly seventeen farms and two churches in our area. We have seven plantations and woods which have coniferous and non-coniferous trees in them.The River Tees is a clean and unpolluted river. There are six becks which flow into the river.
